comments.body: I don't like this minus 6 literal burried deep in the code here.  Can you lift it out into a named, configurable constant?  Also, what's magic about 5?

Actually, I did make this particular time configurable on a separate PR https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/49583. I have put good amount of comments there to explain the same: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/49583/files#diff-e303386d7ba192e209b310d96206a157R75.
